subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay provided a Manny Ramírez-like performance Wednesday night, when he doubled, tripled and drove in four runs to help Boston smother the Yankees, 11-3.
snippet: Jason Bay provided a Manny Ramírez-like performance Wednesday night, when he doubled, tripled and drove in four runs to help Boston smother the Yankees, 11-3.
